name: cringe
text: Wow, tough requirements for an update, especially a minor update. :-( Analysis of JDK sources sounds very theoretical to me and I don't think you can say if there will be problems afterwards anyway. I'd probably start to think about building automated testssuites now, because this demonstrates the pain of untested systems. And after testing the main usecases on the current system you can setup a new test environment with the updated system.
